div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 44 Olympia environs, Elis, c. 1859 (753) Burial: c. 400 B.C.? Contents: 40-50 AR. Pot hoard Aegina: 12 st. Elis:9+ st. (Seltman Grp. C-E) Disposition: Lambros (later Merlin 9 Elis- Sotheby Nov. 11, 1861, 80-8) ; Berlin 1 (Elis-from sale?) Warren, NC 1962, pp. 413-5
